name: The 2nd Int'l Conference on Acoustics, Vibration and Noise Control
content: The 2nd Int'l Conference on Acoustics, Vibration and Noise Control (CAVNC 2018) will be held in Sanya, China during December 1-3, 2018\. CAVNC 2018 will be a valuable and important platform for inspiring Intâ€™l and interdisciplinary exchange at the forefront of Acoustics, Vibration and Noise Control.
